Navigation _includes/navigation.html

Beschreibung:

Aufruf:

{% include navigation.html %}

Einstellungen:

_config.yml 
navigation:
  - debug
  - info
  - helper
locales:
  foo:
    val: foo
    i18n:
      [..]
    meta:
      [..]
    routing:
      base: /foobar/
      routes:
        debug:
          key: debug
          title: debug.title
          url: debug/
        info:
          key: info
          title: info.title
          url: informations/
        helper:
          key: helper
          title: helper.title
          url: helper/
